snippet: Brad Marchand left the Bruins’ morning skate early, causing fans to worry that he might not play Thursday. But he played and hurt the Rangers in overtime with the winning goal.
abstract: Boston Bruins left wing Brad Marchand returns to ice after leaving team's morning skate with what some fans worried was serious injury; he converts Patrice Bergeron pass past Henrik Lundqvist with 4 minutes 20 seconds remaining in the first overtime to give Bruins a 3-2 victory in the series opener.
lead_paragraph: Brad Marchand left the Bruins’ morning skate early, causing fans to worry that he might not play Thursday. But he played and hurt the Rangers in overtime with the winning goal.

headline.seo: Bruins’ Brad Marchand Feels Pain in Morning and Inflicts It at Night on Rangers
headline.main: Marchand Feels Pain in the Morning and Inflicts It at Night
headline.print_headline: Marchand Feels Pain in the Morning and Inflicts It at Night
